name: Edmonton Downtown Historical Tour
description: Why Edmonton? Because it is RICH with history! Did you know Edmonton was one of the first outposts for Western National Trade? Or that there is a genuine, still-lived in, log cabin hidden behind some of Edmonton's skyscrapers? Learn all about the city you live in, or the city your visiting, with a guided, personalized tour for the history geek inside you. Learn things about the town that no one else can tell you, and take pictures with historical monuments. Ask questions, gain knowledge, and get some exercise while you're at it!
